createErrorObject (createErrorObject.html)

Get an error object to issue. This is boradcastType = 'simple', in the global configuration.

Paramaters

  • jwres { Object } - The jwres object returned by Sails Socket.io
  • method { string } - The http method used (usually one of: get|post|put|delete).
  • url { string } - The url requested.
  • additional { Object } - Any query used in the API call.
